org.apache.hc.client5.http.socket.ConnectionSocketFactory

    Package Description
    org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.io
    Client connection management functions based the classic connection management APIs.
    org.apache.hc.client5.http.socket
    Client connection socket APIs.
    org.apache.hc.client5.http.ssl
    Client TLS/SSL support.
